metadata.synopsis: Inwe has stopped chanting as the druids prepare to battle the tieflings in a fight to the death. She's calm and serious - she doesn't want to fight, but she will.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe startdruidattack4. oe druidattackkilldruids5. goto 245.884; 15.103; 513.916. Talk with Inwe

0.speaker: Inwe
0.context: NodeContext: Emphasis on 'will'. The druids are preparing to attack the tieflings in the grove - and the player.
